member.name: T:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation
member.summary: Represents a tenant's personal and identification details within the BBH Records Keeping System. Encapsulates name, contact, birthdate, and valid ID metadata for validation and comparison operations.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's first name used for identification and display purposes.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's last name used for identification and display purposes.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.FullName
member.summary: Gets the tenant's full name in the format "LastName, FirstName" for display and sorting purposes.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's date of birth used for age verification and identity validation.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.Phone
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's contact phone number used for communication and verification.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.ValidID
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's selected valid ID type used for identity verification and classification.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.IDNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's identification number associated with the selected valid ID type.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.IDLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path or resource location of the tenant's valid ID image used for verification.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct with optional tenant metadata. Converts the valid ID string to its corresponding enumeration value.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.IsValid
member.summary: Determines whether all tenant fields are meaningfully initialized and suitable for identity validation.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.op_Equality(REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation,REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are equal by comparing all validated fields. Throws an exception if either operand is missing required data.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.op_Inequality(REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation,REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are not equal by comparing all validated fields. Relies on the equality operator to perform the comparison.
